character_name: Harry Potter: A 17-year-old British wizard.
Ron Weasley: One of Harry's best friends.
Hermione Granger: Harry's other best friend.
Bellatrix Lestrange: A Death Eater and Sirius Black's cousin and murderer.
Rubeus Hagrid: Harry's half-giant friend and a former member of staff at Hogwarts.
Filius Flitwick: The Charms master and Head of the Ravenclaw house at Hogwarts; and also as Griphook
Lord Voldemort: A twisted
Professor Albus Dumbledore: The late headmaster of Hogwarts.
Garrick Ollivander: A wandmaker abducted by the Death Eaters.
Lucius Malfoy: Draco Malfoy's father and a disgraced Death Eater.
Narcissa Malfoy: Draco's mother and Bellatrix's sister.
Draco Malfoy: A Death Eater and son of Lucius and Narcissa Malfoy.
Sirius Black: Harry's late godfather.
Professor Severus Snape: Former Head of the Slytherin House and Potions and Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher and the new headmaster of Hogwarts.
Professor Minerva McGonagall: The Transfiguration teacher and the Head of the Gryffindor house at Hogwarts.
Remus Lupin: A werewolf member of the Order of the Phoenix and a former Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts.
Molly Weasley: The Weasley matriarch.
Ginny Weasley: Ron's younger sister and Harry's love interest.
Neville Longbottom: A schoolfriend and strong supporter of Harry Potter. Neville secretly loves Luna Lovegood.
Luna Lovegood: A seemingly dotty schoolfriend of Harry
